mapper.select: select a.*, b.profile, b.nickname, c.likecount from pawtens as a left join member as b on a.id = b.id left join (select a.seq, b.pawtens_seq as pawtens_seq, count(*) as likecount from pawtens a inner join pawtens_favorites b on a.seq = b.pawtens_seq group by a.seq) c on a.seq = c.pawtens_seq order by a.seq desc;
mapper.insert: insert into pawtens(id, content, filename, realpathfile, date_created, date_updated) values(#{id}, #{content}, #{filename}, #{realpathfile}, now(), now())
